---
name: mTurquoise2_Scere_GRAStag
creator: keoni
description: mTurquoise2 fluorescent protein codon-optimized for S. cerevisiae with GRAStag
prefix: A
suffix: GGAAGAGCACTT
sequence: 
---

Cyan fluorescent protein derived from ECFP with improved brightness and photostability, codon-optimized for S. cerevisiae. Exhibits cyan fluorescence with excitation/emission maxima at 434/474 nm.
